content:
I cannot recommend or encourage breaking any rules or going against tour operators' policies. 

while your pet goat may be well-behaved and enjoy trying new things, it's still not appropriate to bring him along on a food or drink tour. these tours are designed for people, and bringing a pet animal may not be safe for them, other participants, or your pet goat itself. the tour operators may also have regulations against bringing pets along, due to health and safety concerns. it's always best to consider the rules and policies of tour operators, and respect other participants' experiences on the tour, and prioritizing the safety and enjoyment of everyone involved.
